about_the_game:
Voices can add a lot more flavor to any game, but getting good voice actors can be difficult and pricey. With this amazing pack you get the work of six talented English language voice actors to implement them into your story!

The three male and female artists each recorded the lines for each archetype, giving you 6 variations of 6 different archetypes to choose from, allowing you to choose the speaker for the role you consider the best fit for your story.
Includes:

Barkeeper
Merchant
Villager
Priest
Refugee
Guard

Organized and named for ease of use
High Quality 44.1 Khz 16 Bit Audio in .Wav format

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: This pack includes 12 characters voiced by 6 different actors.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
